revised_title: Fossil Plant Organization in Coal Measures: Calamites and Lepidodendra
tldr: The author presents the latest research on the organization of fossil plants from the British Coal Measures, focusing on Calamites and Lepidodendra. They describe the structure and development of these plants, including their vascular systems, and discuss the differences between them. The author also mentions the discovery of new spores and a unique Lepidostrobus species in the area.
